name: Space Adventure - Escape from Siphilus 1b
description:
Space Adventure - Escape form Siphilus 1b is a point & click adventure with challenging puzzles, funny dialogues and beautiful graphics.

On the search for rare minerals, a not entirely unexpected incident occurs and takes our hero to a foreign planet.
Once there, he must find a way through the new world to learn more about the planet and the hidden secrets.

This point & click adventure is a rather quiet, chilled game accompanied by a harmonious electronic sound.
The puzzles aren't easy, so you'll have to put in a little effort.
Don't expect help, you're on your own...as it is in the universe.

Features:
- Over 30 scenes
- Atmospheric graphics
- Harmonious music
- Tricky puzzles
- In RGB colors
- Convenient verb coin interface
- Controllable with mouse
- Infinite gameplay if you don't finish it
- etc.

Have fun!
